image_resize_height.description: Target height to resize the input image before block analysis. Width is scaled proportionally.

num_blocks_horizontal.description: Number of horizontal blocks to divide the image into for diagnostics.

num_blocks_vertical.description: Number of vertical blocks to divide the image into for diagnostics.

shadow_region_warn_threshold.description: Warning threshold for number of dark image blocks.

blockage_region_warn_threshold.description: Warning threshold for number of blocked image blocks.

low_visibility_region_warn_threshold.description: Warning threshold for number of low visibility image blocks.

highlight_region_warn_threshold.description: Warning threshold for number of backlight image blocks.

shadow_region_error_threshold.description: Error threshold for number of dark image blocks.

blockage_region_error_threshold.description: Error threshold for number of blocked image blocks.

low_visibility_region_error_threshold.description: Error threshold for number of low visibility image blocks.

highlight_region_error_threshold.description: Error threshold for number of backlight image blocks.

blockage_ratio_threshold.description: Threshold for the ratio of non-black pixels in a block to be considered blocked.

blockage_intensity_threshold.description: Pixel intensity threshold used to binarize image for blockage detection.

blockage_frequency_ratio_threshold.description: Threshold for average frequency magnitude below which a block is considered blocked.

shadow_intensity_threshold.description: Shadhow intensity threshold under which a block is considered dark.

low_visibility_frequency_threshold.description: Threshold for average frequency magnitude below which a block is considered low visibility (e.g., blurry or foggy).

highlight_intensity_threshold.description: Highlight intensity threshold above which a block is considered overexposed (backlight).
